title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack

Rev up heroic racing adventures with this Batcast Metal diecast 5-pack inspired by DC’s Batwheels. Sized at a kid-friendly 1:55 scale with smooth-rolling wheels, each vehicle is ready for fast action and big storytelling.

What’s included
- Bam the Batmobile
- Redbird
- Prank
- Bibi
- Quizz

Key features
- 1:55 scale diecast construction: Durable Batcast Metal bodies built for everyday play.
- Working wheels: Smooth rolling for races, chases, and high-speed rescues.
- Hero vs. villain fun: Mix of Super Hero and Super-Villain vehicles amps up imaginative play.
- Story-powered play: Encourages creativity and storytelling for preschool fans.
- Playset compatible: Works with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately and subject to availability).
- Kid-friendly design: Sized just right for small hands; great for play at home or on the go.

Specifications
- Material: Diecast metal
- Scale: 1:55
- Number of vehicles: 5
- Recommended age: 3 years and older
- Theme: Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action

Why kids will love it
- Iconic characters from DC’s Batwheels spark instant role-play.
- Sturdy, collectible diecast vehicles made for everyday adventures.
- Perfect starter or add-on set for Batwheels fans.

Perfect gift for preschoolers who love cars, heroes, and high-speed fun. Add the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave to supercharge the action (sold separately, subject to availability).
